.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkBufferViewCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_BUFFER_VIEW_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkBufferViewCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkBufferViewCreateInfo-flags-zerobitmask]] pname:flags must: be `0`
